name: Grow to the sky (Foleps)
description:
Cheat mode: \ - eneble ' - disable. While in cheat mode move with arrows.

This game was made for #Spring2DJam.
Creators: Foleps: programming, desighn 
Neylin: art, sound
Music: in menu: Synth Kid - Please Stay
In game: Synth Kid - Trapped in the Upside Down

Try to reach the sky by growing and climbing up the magic tree!
Can you collect all coins?
